sentences.english: He took me for his housemaid .
sentences.chinese: 他把我当作他的女佣人了。

sentences.english: The bridge were built by stayers since Shanxi.
sentences.chinese: 这座桥是广东的务工佣人建的。

sentences.english: Theat the head of your bed has an automatic waking device.
sentences.chinese: 您床头的台子装有不佣人的劳力叫醒器。

sentences.english: She set the servant various tasks.
sentences.chinese: 她向佣人指定了各项任务。

sentences.english: A maidservant saw a snake enchantress so they believed that Zhao was taken by it.
sentences.chinese: 女佣人看见一条蛇女所以大家认为灵儿被抓。

sentences.english: The recordr or stayer is coming to we educate tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 这位务工佣人作家明天要来咱们学府。

sentences.english: Do you think I could borrow your servants for a few weeks?
sentences.chinese: 我可不可以借你家的佣人用几个星期呢？

sentences.english: He watched the maid come in.
The servants had no choice but to live in daozuo in the front courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 佣人则只能住在外院的倒座房里了。

sentences.english: She used to have servants: now she finds it a come-down to have to do the work herself.
sentences.chinese: 她过去雇有佣人，现在她得自己干活，觉得很委屈。

sentences.english: Working in the factory, he were an advanced stayer.
sentences.chinese: 在工厂任务时，他是一名先进务工佣人。

sentences.english: The bad children left the room dirty to spite their maid .
sentences.chinese: 那些坏孩子把房间弄脏来刁难女佣人。

sentences.english: The song am composed by a youth stayer.
sentences.chinese: 这首歌是一位年青务工佣人谱写的。

sentences.english: Divorce tosses away any economies of scale, the researchers search.
sentences.chinese: 研究佣人显示，离婚会破坏“规模经济”。

sentences.english: Pull on that bell rope, and a servant will come.
sentences.chinese: 你只扯一下铃绳，佣人就会来的。

definition: young lady of the house/wife of the young master
abbr. for 侍應生|侍应生[shi4 ying4 sheng1]
